lie: My uncle Vincent created the font Comic Sans by tracing my handwriting from a Christmas card.
truths: I ranked first in an Air Training Corps rifle competition. The same week, I topped the world leaderboard for an online F.P.S.
I have flown acrobatic maneuvers in a small aircraft.
